title: Here’s another look at WhatsApp’s upcoming Communities feature
content:
For a few months, WhatsApp has been readying its new Communities feature. Now, with the latest beta version of the app, we have another look at this feature.

more…

description: WhatsApp is readying Communities feature. Now, with the latest beta version of the app, it's possible to have another look at the feature.
